404.hint: Sorry, you do not have access or this content does not exist...
All data has been stored in the cloud: All data has been stored in the cloud.
Change avatar hint: New avatar will be shown for everyone.
Change workspace name hint: New name will be shown for everyone.
Cloud Workspace Description: All data will be synchronised and saved to the AFFiNE account <1>{{email}}</1>
Collaboration Description: Collaborating with other members requires AFFiNE Cloud service.
Create Shared Link Description: Create a link you can easily share with anyone.
Default db location hint: By default will be saved to {{location}}
Delete Workspace Description: Deleting <1>{{workspace}}</1> cannot be undone, please proceed with caution. All contents will be lost.
Delete Workspace Description2: Deleting <1>{{workspace}}</1> will delete both local and cloud data, this operation cannot be undone, please proceed with caution.
Delete Workspace Label Hint: After deleting this Workspace, you will permanently delete all of its content for everyone. No one will be able to recover the content of this Workspace.
Disable Public Link Description: Disabling this public link will prevent anyone with the link from accessing this page.
Download data Description1: It takes up more space on your device.
Download data Description2: It takes up little space on your device.
Enable AFFiNE Cloud Description: If enabled, the data in this workspace will be backed up and synchronised via AFFiNE Cloud.
Enable cloud hint: The following functions rely on AFFiNE Cloud. All data is stored on the current device. You can enable AFFiNE Cloud for this workspace to keep data in sync with the cloud.
Export Description: You can export the entire Workspace data for backup, and the exported data can be re-imported.
Export Shared Pages Description: Download a static copy of your page to share with others.
Get in touch! Join our communities: Get in touch! Join our communities.
Get in touch! Join our communities.
Heading: Heading {{number}}
Invitation sent hint: Invited members have been notified with email to join this Workspace.
Invite Members Message: Invited members will collaborate with you in current workspace
It takes up little space on your device: It takes up little space on your device.
It takes up little space on your device.
It takes up more space on your device: It takes up more space on your device.
It takes up more space on your device.
Leave Workspace Description: After you leave, you will no longer be able to access the contents of this workspace.
Leave Workspace hint: After you leave, you will not be able to access content within this workspace.
Local Workspace Description: All data is stored on the current device. You can enable AFFiNE Cloud for this workspace to keep data in sync with the cloud.
Members hint: Manage members here, invite new member by email.
Open folder hint: Check the where the storage folder is located.
Placeholder of delete workspace: Please type workspace name to confirm
Please make sure you are online: Please make sure you are online
Published Description: The current workspace has been published to the web, everyone can view the contents of this workspace through the link.
Published hint: Visitors can view the contents through the provided link.
Publishing: Publishing to web requires AFFiNE Cloud service.
Publishing Description: After publishing to the web, everyone can view the content of this workspace through the link.
RFP: Docs can be freely added/removed from pivots, remaining accessible from "All docs".
Saved then enable AFFiNE Cloud: All changes are saved locally, click to enable AFFiNE Cloud.
Set up an AFFiNE account to sync data: Set up an AFFiNE account to sync data
Share Menu Public Workspace Description1: Invite others to join the Workspace or publish it to web.
Share Menu Public Workspace Description2: Current workspace has been published to the web as a public workspace.
Shared Pages Description: Sharing doc publicly requires AFFiNE Cloud service.
Shared Pages In Public Workspace Descrip: The entire workspace is published on the web and can be edited via <1>Workspace settings</1>.
Sign out description: Signing out will cause the unsynchronised content to be lost.
Sync across devices with AFFiNE Cloud: Sync across devices with AFFiNE Cloud
Title: Title
TrashButtonGroupDescription: Once deleted, you can't undo this action. Do you confirm?
Unpublished hint: Once published to the web, visitors can view the contents through the provided link.
Workspace database storage description: Select where you want to create your workspace. The data of workspace is saved locally by default.
Workspace description: A workspace is your virtual space to capture, create and plan as just one person or together as a team.
You cannot delete the last workspace: You cannot delete the last workspace

Do you want to use the plugin system that is in an experimental stage?
You are about to enable an experimental feature. This feature is still in development and may contain errors or behave unpredictably. Please proceed with caution and at your own risk.
com.arms.settings.workspace.not-owner: Only an owner can edit the workspace avatar and name. Changes will be shown for everyone.
com.arms.settings.workspace.properties.d: The "<1>{{ name }}</1>" property will be remove from {{ count }} doc(s). This action cannot be undone.
com.arms.settings.workspace.publish-tool: Enable AFFiNE Cloud to publish this workspace
com.arms.share-menu.ShareViaExportDescri: Download a static copy of your doc to share with others.
com.arms.share-menu.ShareWithLinkDescrip: Create a link you can easily share with anyone. The visitors will open your doc in the form od a document
You have changed the public link from {{preMode}} Mode to {{currentMode}} Mode.
com.arms.share-menu.create-public-link.n: You can share this document with link.
com.arms.share-menu.disable-publish-link: This doc is no longer shared publicly.
com.arms.share-menu.publish-to-web.descr: Let anyone with a link view a read-only version of this doc.
com.arms.share-menu.share-privately.desc: Only members of this workspace can open this link.
com.arms.share-page.footer.description: Empower your sharing with AFFiNE Cloud: One-click doc sharing
com.arms.star-affine.description: Are you finding our app useful and enjoyable? We'd love your support to keep improving! A great way to help us out is by giving us a star on GitHub. This simple action can make a big difference and helps us continue to deliver the best experience for you.
com.arms.star-affine.title: Star us on GitHub
com.arms.storage.disabled.hint: AFFiNE Cloud is currently in early access phase and is not supported for upgrading, please be patient and wait for our pricing plan.
com.arms.storage.extend.hint: The usage has reached its maximum capacity, AFFiNE Cloud is currently in early access phase and is not supported for upgrading, please be patient and wait for our pricing plan.
com.arms.storage.extend.link: To get more information click here.
com.arms.storage.maximum-tips: You have reached the maximum capacity limit for your current account
com.arms.storage.maximum-tips.pro: Pro users will have unlimited storage capacity during the alpha test period of the team version
com.arms.storage.title: AFFiNE Cloud storage
com.arms.telemetry.enable.desc: Telemetry is a feature that allows us to collect data on how you use the app. This data helps us improve the app and provide better features.
com.arms.trashOperation.delete.descripti: Once deleted, you can't undo this action. Do you confirm?
com.arms.trashOperation.delete.title: Permanently delete
com.arms.trashOperation.deleteDescriptio: Once deleted, you can't undo this action. Do you confirm?
com.arms.upgrade.tips.done: After upgrading the workspace data, please refresh the page to see the changes.
com.arms.upgrade.tips.error: We encountered some errors while upgrading the workspace data.
com.arms.upgrade.tips.normal: To ensure compatibility with the updated AFFiNE client, please upgrade your data by clicking the "Upgrade workspace data" button below.
com.arms.workspace.cannot-delete: You cannot delete the last workspace
com.arms.workspace.enable-cloud.failed: Failed to enable Cloud, please try again.
com.arms.workspaceDelete.description: Deleting <1>{{workspace}}</1> cannot be undone, please proceed with caution. All contents will be lost.
com.arms.workspaceDelete.description2: Deleting <1>{{workspace}}</1> will delete both local and cloud data, this operation cannot be undone, please proceed with caution.
com.arms.workspaceDelete.placeholder: Please type workspace name to confirm
com.arms.workspaceDelete.title: Delete workspace
com.arms.workspaceLeave.description: After you leave, you will no longer be able to access the contents of this workspace.
emptyAllPages: Click on the <1></1> button to create your first doc.
emptyAllPagesClient: Click on the <1></1> button Or press <3>{{shortcut}}</3> to create your first doc.
emptyFavorite: Click Add to favorites and the doc will appear here.
emptyTrash: Click Add to trash and the doc will appear here.
mobile device: Looks like you are browsing on a mobile device.
mobile device description: We are still working on mobile support and recommend you use a desktop device.
recommendBrowser: We recommend the <1>Chrome</1> browser for optimal experience.
upgradeBrowser: Please upgrade to the latest version of Chrome for the best experience.
